# Large File Test - Version 2 (Updated)
# This file contains many lines to test diff performance
# Added a new comment line

## Section 1: Introduction (Revised)

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. 
Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco.
Laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit.

## Section 2: Data (Modified)

Line 12: Value C
Line 13: Value D (updated)
Line 14: Value E
Line 15: NEW VALUE INSERTED
Line 16: Value F
Line 17: Value G

## Section 3: Configuration (Updated)

config.setting1 = false
config.setting2 = true
config.setting3 = "new_value"
config.setting4 = 100
config.setting5 = 3.14159
config.setting6 = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
config.setting7 = {"key": "updated", "new_key": true}
config.setting8 = "not_null_anymore"
config.setting9 = "brand_new"

## Section 4: Code Examples (Improved)

```python
def example_function(multiplier: int = 1) -> int:
    """Calculate sum with optional multiplier."""
    x = 10
    y = 20
    return (x + y) * multiplier
```

```javascript
const anotherExample = (factor = 2) => {
    const data = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5];
    return data.map(x => x * factor);
};
```

```go
func newExample() int {
    return 42
}
```

## Section 5: Tables (Expanded)

| Column 1 | Column 2 | Column 3 | Column 4 |
|----------|----------|----------|----------|
| A1       | B1       | C1       | D1       |
| A2       | B2-MOD   | C2       | D2       |
| A3       | B3       | C3       | D3       |
| A4       | B4       | C4       | D4       |
| A5       | B5       | C5       | D5       |
| A6       | B6       | C6       | D6       |

## Section 6: Lists (Reorganized)

1. First item (priority high)
2. Second item (priority medium)
3. Third item (priority low)
4. Fourth item
5. Fifth item
6. Sixth item (new)

- Bullet one - updated
- Bullet two
- Bullet three (removed)
- Bullet four - modified text
- Bullet five
- Bullet six (new addition)

## Section 7: Repeated Content (Deduplicated)

This paragraph appears once now.
And this line too.
More content follows.
The text continues with updates.
Additional lines here with modifications.
